purpose: To provide a centralized collection of high-quality resources and libraries for users of the Robot Framework
principle: Crowdsourced and community-driven curation of resources, categorized and maintained through GitHub
reusability: Easily accessible and integratable list of resources for enhancing Robot Framework usage, with contributions from the community
limitations: Dependent on community contributions for updates and may not cover all emerging tools or libraries
platforms: Any platform supporting Python and Robot Framework
name: awesome-robotframework
description: A curated list of awesome Robot Framework resources and libraries
highlight: Comprehensive collection of curated resources and libraries for Robot Framework users
